author: ASFN Admin
title: Royals rally, beat Astros 5-4 to even ALDS at 1 game each (Yahoo Sports)
text: Posts: 54,166 Royals rally, beat Astros 5-4 to even ALDS at 1 game each (Yahoo Sports) The Kansas City Royals whipped out the same formula that carried them to last year's World Series to turn back the Houston Astros and tie their AL Division Series at a game apiece. ''Just battling,'' first baseman Eric Hosmer said. The Royals rallied from a three-run deficit Friday, getting a go-ahead single from Ben Zobrist in the seventh inning, and then watched Wade Davis and the bullpen make it stand in a 5-4 victory that brought back memories of their nip-and-tuck postseason of a year ago.
